channel.title: 法新社
channel.description: 这是一个追踪法新社news的种子

item.title: 日本一家广受欢迎的 Hello Kitty 主题游乐园的经营者说，该游乐园在收到一封 "恐怖主义威胁邮件 "后于周六关闭了一天。位于首都东京的 Sanrio Puroland 以其游乐设施、表演和可爱的卡通吉祥物而闻名。➡️
item.description:
A popular Hello Kitty-themed amusement park in Japan closed for the day on Saturday after receiving an "email threatening terrorism", its operator said. Sanrio Puroland in the capital Tokyo is known for its rides, shows and cutesy cartoon mascots.
➡️ https://t.co/YneHHckUBk pic.twitter.com/IHjlXshRFP

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 北约组织领导人延斯-斯托尔滕贝格周六敦促乌克兰及其盟国不要 "失去信心"，因为俄罗斯总统弗拉基米尔-普京在战争爆发两年后继续发动血腥攻势，而乌克兰兵力薄弱的部队正努力守住前线。➡️。
item.description:
NATO chief Jens Stoltenberg on Saturday urged Ukraine and its allies not to "lose heart" as Russian President Vladimir Putin presses his bloody offensive two years into the war and as Ukraine's outgunned troops are struggling to hold the front line.
➡️ https://t.co/F5Ob9IiRCR pic.twitter.com/Ls8JYeXfuK

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 视频2022 年 2 月 24 日，俄罗斯入侵乌克兰，发动了二战以来欧洲最大规模的战争。分析人士称，2024 年将是激烈战斗的又一年，乌克兰决心夺回失去的领土。
item.description:
VIDEO: On 24 February 2022, Russia invaded Ukraine, launching the biggest war in Europe since World War II. Two years on, there is still no end in sight to the war, Analysts say 2024 will be another year of fierce fighting with Ukraine determined to recapture lost territory. pic.twitter.com/u3L0CXKetk

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: #半导体巨头台积电的创始人张铭顺（Morris Chang）在开业典礼上表示，台积电在日本的新工厂将提高全球微芯片供应的弹性，这是这位 92 岁高龄的老人罕见地公开露面。
item.description:
#BREAKING TSMC's new plant in Japan will boost the resilience of global microchip supplies, the semiconductor giant's founder Morris Chang says at its opening ceremony, a rare public appearance by the 92-year-old pic.twitter.com/WC8KWHgmhf

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 周五在法国举行的恺撒奖颁奖典礼上，《摔跤吧！爸爸》获得了包括最佳影片在内的六项大奖。但是，女演员朱迪斯-戈德雷什（Judith Godreche）却让当晚的得奖者和失利者黯然失色，她上台谴责了行业内的性虐待....。
item.description:
'Anatomy of a Fall' was the big winner at Friday's Cesar Awards in France, with six trophies including best film.

But the night's winners and losers were eclipsed by actress Judith Godreche, who took to the stage to denounce sexual abuse within the industry.… pic.twitter.com/R2rwKBrU4o

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 中国南京一栋居民楼发生火灾，当局称至少有 15 人死亡。另有 44 人受伤，其中一人伤势严重。这是近几个月来中国发生的一系列致命火灾中的最新一起
item.description:
At least 15 people have died in a fire that tore through a residential building in China's Nanjing, authorities said. Another 44 were injured, with one in critical condition.
It's the latest in a series of deadly blazes in the country in recent months https://t.co/lyb41323v0

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰外交部长德米特罗-库莱巴周五在联合国大会上指责俄罗斯在对基辅的战争进入第三年之际无视世界的意愿。
item.description:
Ukraine's Foreign Minister Dmytro Kuleba accused Russia at the UN General Assembly on Friday of ignoring the will of the world as its war against Kyiv enters a third year https://t.co/bAGCWc79ry

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 24, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周五在南卡罗来纳州共和党初选前召集支持者，希望在对手尼基-黑利（Nikki Haley）的家乡再给她一击。
item.description:
Donald Trump rallied his supporters on Friday ahead of the South Carolina Republican primary, hoping to deal yet another blow against rival Nikki Haley, this time in her home state https://t.co/ZhNjUZUFY6

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: #法国对乌克兰的支持 "不会减弱"，马克龙誓言
item.description:
#BREAKING France's support for Ukraine 'will not weaken', Macron vows pic.twitter.com/FWZGmbssdj

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: #美国登月飞船可能侧卧在月球上：公司
item.description:
#BREAKING US spaceship on Moon likely lying on its side: company pic.twitter.com/Ovc5HuhrCy

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 周五，阿根廷全国各地数千人举行抗议活动，要求向穷人提供粮食援助，因为通胀飙升和哈维尔-米莱伊总统严厉的紧缩措施造成了巨大损失
item.description:
Thousands protested across Argentina on Friday to demand food aid for the poor as soaring inflation and President Javier Milei's harsh austerity measures take their toll https://t.co/FExQRqa9yi

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 新@法新社：昨天，一则关于谷歌日落Gmail的骗局在网上疯传，甚至成为X网站的热门话题。
item.description:
New @AFP:

A hoax about Google sunsetting Gmail went viral yesterday, even trending on X.

The artist behind it created the fake announcement by using "inspect element" to doctor an old Google email -- proving how easy it is to fabricate content online.https://t.co/RI5NvbufJI

— Bill McCarthy (@billdmccarthy) February 23, 2024

item.title: 这对乌克兰夫妇躲过了俄罗斯的入侵，因为他们当时住在以色列。后来，他们错过了加沙战争，因为他们从以色列搬到了西班牙。但是，当一场大火烧毁了巴伦西亚的一个住宅区时，他们失去了一切
item.description:
The Ukrainian couple escaped the Russian invasion because they were staying in Israel. Then they missed the Gaza war because they had moved from Israel to Spain. But when a fire gutted a housing block in Valencia, they lost everything https://t.co/puMo35ntCe

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 塞内加尔推迟的总统选举中的大多数候选人和一个大型民间社会团体表示，他们将拒绝参加总统麦基-萨勒为决定本月早些时候推迟的投票日期而提议举行的会谈。
item.description:
Most candidates in Senegal's delayed presidential election and a large civil society collective said they would refuse to take part in talks proposed by President Macky Sall to decide a date for the vote he postponed earlier this month https://t.co/oNNu0uLg3E

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 在厄瓜多尔的一所监狱里，身着橙色衣服的囚犯排着整齐的队伍，进行军事训练和扫地。
item.description:
Orange-clad prisoners line up with military precision to exercise and sweep floors at an Ecuador prison where drug lords once enjoyed jacuzzis and nightclubs, and stashed drugs and weapons in the walls https://t.co/2MjO3ERb0T

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 西班牙足球甲级联赛负责人哈维尔-特巴斯（Javier Tebas）认为，几乎可以肯定，法国超级前锋基利安-姆巴佩下赛季将为皇家马德里效力 #AFPSports
item.description:
Spain's La Liga chief Javier Tebas believes it is almost certain that superstar French striker Kylian Mbappe will be playing for Real Madrid next season #AFPSports https://t.co/aFCMSwvrK1

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 奥地利一家法院周五裁定前总理塞巴斯蒂安-库尔茨向议会调查提供虚假证词罪名成立，判处其八个月监禁，缓期执行
item.description:
An Austrian court on Friday found former chancellor Sebastian Kurz guilty of giving false testimony to a parliamentary inquiry, handing him an eight-month suspended jail sentence https://t.co/23YJZUPPhG

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: #美国国务卿安东尼-布林肯（Antony Blinken）重申，华盛顿反对以色列重新占领加沙地带并缩小其面积。
item.description:
#BREAKING US Secretary of State Antony Blinken reaffirms Washington's opposition to a reoccupation of the Gaza strip by Israel as well as any reduction of its size pic.twitter.com/d723Jm9uTS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 周五，农民们开着拖拉机来到巴黎市中心，向埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统施压，马克龙总统承诺将在即将举行的法国农业博览会上与他们会面，讨论他们的不满。
item.description:
Farmers drove their tractors into central Paris on Friday to raise the pressure on President Emmanuel Macron, who has promised them a meeting at France's coming agriculture fair bonanza to discuss their grievances https://t.co/1iCZssJfOK pic.twitter.com/GMyJV20GVR

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：在中国越来越多的欠发达地区，五菱宏光Mini--一种小巧的双门电动车--成为绿色交通工具的代言。
item.description:
VIDEO: In a growing number of less-developed areas in China, the face of greener transport is the Wuling Hongguang Mini -- a dinky two-door electric vehicle. pic.twitter.com/3KyBhcgDNS

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 这位英国亿万富翁批评了 "绿色 "汽车的续航里程限制，曼联的新共同所有人吉姆-拉特克利夫（Jim Ratcliffe）周五公布了他的英力士集团（Ineos group）最新的四轮驱动汽车，该汽车将有两个电动版本。➡️ by @benperry28 for @AFP.
item.description:
Manchester United's new co-owner Jim Ratcliffe unveiled Friday his Ineos group's latest 4x4 vehicle, which will come in two electric versions as the British billionaire criticised range limits on 'green' cars.
➡️ https://t.co/NmBCBYbvNG by @benperry28 for @AFP pic.twitter.com/iFvuBzroy7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：在阿拉伯裔美国人占多数的迪尔伯恩市，选民们发誓要抛弃乔-拜登总统，因为他在加沙战争中坚定地支持以色列。🎥 @BastInzaurralde #AFPVertical
item.description:
VIDEO: Voters in the Arab American majority city of Dearborn are vowing to ditch President Joe Biden over his steadfast support of Israel in its war in Gaza.

🎥 @BastInzaurralde #AFPVertical pic.twitter.com/vFPINLquDw

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频2022 年 2 月 24 日，俄罗斯入侵乌克兰，发动了二战以来欧洲最大规模的战争。分析人士称，2024 年将是激烈战斗的又一年，乌克兰决心夺回失去的领土。
item.description:
VIDEO: On 24 February 2022, Russia invaded Ukraine, launching the biggest war in Europe since World War II. Two years on, there is still no end in sight to the war, Analysts say 2024 will be another year of fierce fighting with Ukraine determined to recapture lost territory. pic.twitter.com/xLfbC4kGYZ

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: #阿联酋被除名，肯尼亚和纳米比亚被列入国际洗钱灰色名单
item.description:
#BREAKING UAE removed, Kenya and Namibia added to int'l money laundering grey list pic.twitter.com/WoTWYI16jN

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：数百人在白天前往伦敦的一家夜总会，这在英国是一个新的概念，为那些仍有跳舞冲动但不想再忍受不眠之夜的人而设。
item.description:
VIDEO: Hundreds of people head to a London nightclub in the middle of the day, a new concept in Britain for those who still have an urge to dance but who no longer want to endure a sleepless night to do so. pic.twitter.com/HemLpnSKfH

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 七届一级方程式赛车冠军得主刘易斯-汉密尔顿（Lewis Hamilton）表示，他将于 2025 年转投法拉利车队，这将为他闪耀的职业生涯增添崭新的篇章，但他坚持认为，他希望能以优异的成绩离开梅赛德斯车队。
item.description:
Seven-time Formula 1 champion Lewis Hamilton says his switch to Ferrari programmed for 2025 will add a brand new chapter to his sparkling career, but insisted he hopes to leave Mercedes on a high.#AFPSports https://t.co/ppJm9slF2b

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 视频：在秘鲁北部的一个省份，人们租用小船或步行推车艰难地渡过洪水泛滥的河流。
item.description:
VIDEO: In a northern province of Peru, people struggle to cross a flooding river by renting small boats or pushing vehicles on foot. pic.twitter.com/xtNftmyaEB

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 哥伦比亚政府周五宣布进行一次考察，以从传奇的圣何塞大帆船残骸中清除 "价值无法估量 "的物品。
item.description:
Colombia's government on Friday announced an expedition to remove items of "incalculable value" from the wreck of the legendary San Jose Galleon, which sank in 1708 while laden with gold, silver and emeralds estimated to be worth billions of dollars.https://t.co/f2AV3GcFI7

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 周五，农民们开着拖拉机来到巴黎市中心，向埃马纽埃尔-马克龙总统施压，马克龙承诺将在即将举行的法国农业博览会上与他们会面，讨论他们的不满。
item.description:
Farmers drove their tractors into central Paris on Friday to raise the pressure on President Emmanuel Macron, who has promised them a meeting at France's coming agriculture fair bonanza to discuss their grievances.https://t.co/qtfNmZuDaA

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024

item.title: 随着亚美尼亚领导人尼科尔-帕希尼扬（Nikol Pashinyan）寻求减少这个小国对前主人俄罗斯的依赖，法国和亚美尼亚周五欢呼军事合作不断加强。
item.description:
France and Armenia on Friday hailed growing military cooperation as Armenian leader Nikol Pashinyan seeks to reduce his small country's dependence on former master Russia.https://t.co/gDydzcfxHF

— AFP News Agency (@AFP) February 23, 2024
